name: 220+ Resources for graphic designers
description: The ultimate graphic design resource package has arrived in the form of a Notion template, including over 220 free resources to take your design work to the next level. With our comprehensive template, you can say goodbye to the hassle of scouring the internet for the best graphic design resources. It's free to use and was created to assist graphic designers, artists, and creatives not to waste any more time searching for the perfect design resources. features: Access for life (regular updates); More than 200 Resources; Save time on research.
